backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access-controlled user profiles, inventory, shipments, logs, facilities, and CRM relationships with CRUD and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend theme and UI polish tasks to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file and component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles with custom OKLCH color tokens and light/dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, profile setup, dashboard rendering, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/CRMTab.tsx: CRM management tab for creating, editing, deleting, and annotating medical facility relationships.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard summary showing inventory totals, low stock, pending shipments, and system metrics with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an icon, message, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/FacilityTab.tsx: Displays and manages health facilities with add dialog and list loading states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows app header with branding, theme toggle, and user account menu with logout.
frontend/src/components/InventoryTab.tsx: Manages inventory items including search, add item dialog, and quantity updates.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing screen prompting users to log in using Internet Identity with feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/MovementTab.tsx: Handles logging and displaying equipment movement between locations.
frontend/src/components/PageHeader.tsx: Reusable page header component with title, description, and optional action slot.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for entering and saving a user's name and contact information on first setup.
frontend/src/components/ReportTab.tsx: Provides UI for generating summary and per-hospital reports, handling date inputs, API mutations, and displaying results.
frontend/src/components/ShipmentTab.tsx: Manages shipment creation and status updates, showing shipment lists and dialogs for selecting destinations and equipment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, storing and loading identities, and exposing login and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend operations such as inventory, shipments, user profiles, dashboard data, and reports.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark healthcare-themed UI color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard page with tab navigation and renders overview, inventory, shipment, movement, facility, CRM, and report components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URLs or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, container settings, plugins, and extended theme values for the project.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, including feature summaries, versions, and architecture details for the MediDistribusi app.
